entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
